system.description: This spell generates a bank of fog similar to fog cloud, except that its vapors are yellowish green and poisonous. The vapors automatically kill any living creature with 3 or fewer HD (no save). A living creature with 4 to 6 HD is slain unless it succeeds on a Fortitude save (in which case it takes 1d4 points of Constitution damage on your turn each round while in the cloud). A living creature with 6 or more HD takes 1d4 points of Constitution damage on your turn each round while in the cloud (Fortitude save halves). Holding one's breath doesn't help; creatures immune to poison are unaffected. The cloud moves away from you at 10 feet per round. The vapors are heavier than air and sink to the lowest level; they cannot penetrate liquids nor be cast underwater.
system.target: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
